verbose_text: Melatonin was also reported to induce caspase dependent apoptosis in human leukemia Molt-3 cells XREF_BIBR, and inhibit MLL rearranged leukemia through suppressing the RBFOX3 / hTERT and NF-kappaB / COX-2 signaling pathways XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Melatonin was also reported to induce caspase-dependent apoptosis
